1022.name: [Limited Time Quest] "DesDiv32" Monthly Combat Patrol!
1022.desc_jp:
【期間限定哨戒】第三十二駆逐隊、夕雲型駆逐艦「玉波」「涼波」「藤波」「早波」「浜波」のうち
3隻以上を含む艦隊で、東部オリョール海、ジャム島沖、南方海域前面、ブルネイ沖の哨戒を実施せよ！
1022.desc: Organize a fleet with 3 of Tamanami, Suzunami, Fujinami, Hayanami and Hamanami in your fleet and score an A rank at the boss nodes on 2-3, 4-1, 5-1 and 7-1

1023.name_jp: 三十二駆「藤波改二」、鳥海を護衛せよ！
1023.name: DesDiv32 "Fujinami Kai Ni", Escort Choukai!
1023.desc_jp:
「藤波改二」旗艦、艦隊に「鳥海」及び第三十二駆逐隊1隻を含む部隊で、沖ノ島海域、沖ノ島沖、
タウイタウイ泊地沖(深部)、サーモン海域北方に出撃！「鳥海」を護衛しつつ、遊弋する敵を痛打せよ！
1023.desc: Organize a fleet with Fujinami Kai Ni as flagship, Choukai and any of Tamanami, Suzunami, Hayanami and Hamanami in your fleet and score an S rank at the boss nodes on 2-2, 2-4, 7-2 (part 2), and 5-5

1025.name_jp: 精鋭十一駆「白雪改二」、抜錨します！
1025.name: Elite DesDiv11 「Shirayuki Kai Ni」, Set Sail!
1025.desc_jp:
「白雪改二」旗艦、他に吹雪型1隻以上を含む精鋭艦隊で、東部オリョール海、沖ノ島沖、
リランカ島、サブ島沖海域に進出！改吹雪型駆逐艦の実力を発揮し、敵艦隊を一掃せよ！
1025.desc: Organize a fleet with Shirayuki Kai Ni as the flagship and another Fubuki-class in your fleet and score an S rank at the boss nodes on 2-3, 2-5, 4-3 and 5-3

1101.name: Redevelopment of the Naval Arsenals
1101.desc_jp:
工廠整備：「12.7cm連装砲」x8廃棄、家具コインx4,000と「14cm単装砲」「20.3cm連装砲」各x4を
準備せよ！※任務達成後、用意した家具コイン及び必要装備(低改修値のもの優先)は消費します。
1101.desc: Scrap 8 12.7cm Twin Gun Mounts, and then prepare 4,000 Furniture Tokens and have 4 14cm Single Gun Mount, and 4 20.3cm Twin Gun Mounts in your inventory. (All token and unmodded equipment will be removed upon completion of quest)

1102.name_jp: 工廠による装備兵装の強化準備
1102.name: Preparation for modifying equipment through the arsenal
1102.desc_jp:
「12cm単装砲」x7廃棄、燃料x2,400と「20.3cm連装砲」「35.6cm連装砲」各x5を準備せよ！
※任務達成後、用意した燃料及び必要装備(低改修値のもの優先)は消費します。
1102.desc: Arsenal Mission: Scrap 7 12cm Single Gun Mounts, and then prepare 2,400 Fuel and have 5 20.3cm Twin Gun Mounts, and 5 35.6cm Twin Gun Mounts in your inventory. (All resources and unmodded equipment will be removed upon completion of quest)

1103.name_jp: 潜水艦強化兵装の量産
1103.name: Mass Production of Reinforced Submarine Armaments
1103.desc_jp:
「61cm三連装(酸素)魚雷」x3廃棄、開発資材x60と「九三式水中聴音機」「13号対空電探改」各x2を
準備せよ！　※任務達成後、用意した開発資材及び必要装備(低改修値のもの優先)は消費します。
1103.desc: Scrap 3 61cm Triple (Oxygen) Torpedo Mounts, and then prepare 60 development Materials and have 2 Type 93 Sonars, and 2 Type 13 Air Radar Kai in your inventory. (All resources and unmodded equipment will be removed upon completion of quest)

1104.name_jp: 潜水艦電子兵装の量産
1104.name: Mass Production of Submarine Radar Equipment
1104.desc_jp:
「13号対空電探改」x3廃棄、開発資材x100と「九三式水中聴音機」及び「22号対水上電探」各x2を
準備せよ！　※任務達成後、用意した開発資材及び必要装備(低改修値のもの優先)は消費します。
1104.desc: Arsenal Mission: Scrap 3 Type 13 Air Radar Kai, and then prepare 100 development Materials and have 2 Type 93 Sonars, and 2 Type 22 Surface Radars in your inventory. (All resources and unmodded equipment will be removed upon completion of quest)

1105.name_jp: 夏の格納庫整備＆航空基地整備
1105.name: Summer Hangar & Air Base Maintenance
1105.desc_jp:
九六式や一式陸攻等の陸上攻撃機x3廃棄、弾薬x2,800と「九七式艦攻」「天山」各x4を準備せよ！
※任務達成後、用意した弾薬及び必要装備(低改修値のもの優先)は消費します。
1105.desc: Scrap 3 Land Based Attack Aircraft such as Type 96 and Type 1 LBAA. Then prepare 2800 ammo, 4 T97 torpedo bombers and 4 Tenzan. (All resources and unmodded equipment will be removed upon completion of quest)

1106.name_jp: 精鋭三座水上偵察機隊の前線投入
1106.name: Frontline utilization of elite three-seated seaplane recon aircraft
1106.desc_jp:
旗艦「由良改二」第一スロに最大改修「零式水上偵察機11型乙」。 「零式水上偵察機」「瑞雲」各x3
廃棄、燃料x1,300、ボーキ1,700、新型航空兵装資材x1、戦闘詳報x1、熟練搭乗員x3を準備せよ！
1106.desc: Yura Kai Ni as the flagship and equipped with a maximum improved Type 0 Reconnaissance Seaplane Model 11B in the first slot. Scrap 3 Type 0 Reconnaissance Seaplane and 3 Zuiun. Prepare 1300 fuel, 1700 bauxite, 1 aerial armament material, an action report and 3 skilled crew members. The resource and the items will be consumed. (All resources and unmodded equipment will be removed upon completion of quest)

1107.name_jp: 【鋼材輸出】基地航空兵力を増備せよ！
1107.name: [Exportation of Steel] Increase the Strength of your Air Base!
1107.desc_jp:
鋼材を輸出し、ボーキサイトを輸入、基地航空を増備せよ！「艦戦」「艦攻」系装備各x2ずつ廃棄、
鋼材24,000及び開発資材10を準備せよ！　※任務達成後、準備した資材は消費します。
1107.desc: Prepare 24,000 steel, 10 development Materials and proceed to scrap 2 Fighters and 2 Torpedo Bombers (All resources and Materials will be consumed upon completion)

1108.name_jp: 調整改良型「水中探信儀」の増産
1108.name: Increase the production of the newly adjusted and modified "Active Sonar"
1108.desc_jp:
旗艦「山風改二/丁」または「時雨改二」第一装備スロに最大改修「三式水中探信儀」。「九三式水中
聴音機」及び「三式水中探信儀」各x2廃棄。新型兵装資材x2、開発資材x30、ボーキ1,300を準備せよ！
1108.desc: Have your secretary flagship Yamakaze Kai Ni/D or Shigure Kai Ni equip a max improved Type 3 Active Sonar in the first slot and then proceed to scrap 2x Type 3 Active Sonars and 2x Type 93 Passive Sonars and have 2x New Model Armament Material, 30x Development Materials and 1300 bauxite (All resources and Materials will be consumed upon completion)

1109.name_jp: 上陸作戦支援用装備の配備
1109.name: Deployment of equipment to support landing operations
1109.desc_jp:
旗艦「神州丸」の第一装備スロットに最大改修「大発動艇(八九式中戦車＆陸戦隊)」を搭載。
「7.7mm機銃」「大発動艇」各x2廃棄。高速建造材x8、開発資材x10、鋼材800を準備せよ！
1109.desc: Have your secretary flagship Shinshuu Maru equip a maxed modified Daihatsu Landing Craft (Type 89 Medium Tank & Landing Force) in the first slot and then proceed to scrap 2 7.7mm Machine Gun, 2 Daihatsu and have 8 Instant Construction Materials, 10 Development Mateirals, and 800 steel (All resources and Materials will be consumed upon completion)

1111.name_jp: 精鋭「一式陸攻」隊の編成
1111.name: Organization of elite "set of land based attack" squadrons
1111.desc_jp:
精鋭陸攻隊の編成：野中隊長率いる精鋭陸攻隊の編成を行う！「一式陸攻 二二型甲」(最大改修)x1、
さらに「一式陸攻」x2、熟練搭乗員x3を準備せよ！(任務達成後、用意した必要装備は消滅します)
1111.desc: Prepare following items: a maximum improved Type 1 Land-based Attack Aircraft Model 22A, two Type 1 Land-based Attack Aircraft and three skilled crew members (The items will be consumed).

1112.name: Naval Base "General Cleaning" Festival!
1112.desc_jp:
「小口径主砲」「中口径主砲」「大口径主砲」各x4装備を廃棄、ドラム缶(輸送用)x1、開発資材x10
鋼材1,800を準備せよ！(任務達成後、準備した資源・ドラム缶(輸送用)・開発資材は消費)
1112.desc: Scrap 4 small/4 medium/4 large guns. Have 1 Drum Canister, 10x Development Material, 1800 bauxite (it will be consumed upon completion).

1113.name_jp: 「無線誘導弾」装備新型襲撃機の実戦配備
1113.name: Actual deployment of assault aircraft equipped with "guided missiles"
1113.desc_jp:
イ号一型乙誘導弾搭載機の開発：陸軍新鋭襲撃機「キ102乙」x1及び「二式複戦 屠龍 丙型」x1、
熟練搭乗員x2、さらに新型航空兵装資材x4を準備せよ！(任務達成後、用意した資材等は消滅します)
1113.desc: Have 1x Ki-102 B, 1x Type 2 Two-seat Fighter Toryuu Model C, 2x Skilled Crew Member, 4x New Model Aviation Material (All resources and Materials will be consumed upon completion)

1114.name: New equipment development plan I
1114.desc_jp:
「小口径主砲」「中口径主砲」「副砲」各x3装備を廃棄、「35.6cm連装砲」x3、高速建造材x8、
ボーキサイト800を準備せよ！(任務達成後、準備した資源・装備・高速建造材は消費します)
1114.desc: Have 3x 35.6cm Twin Gun Mount, 8 flamethrower, 800 bauxite and then proceed to scrap 3x small gun, 3x medium gun, 3 secondary gun (All resources and Materials will be consumed upon completion)

1115.name: New equipment development plan II
1115.desc_jp:
「大口径主砲」「副砲」「水上偵察機」各x3装備を廃棄、「46cm三連装砲」x2、「洋上補給」x4、
弾薬2,700を準備せよ！(任務達成後、準備した資源・装備・洋上補給は消費します)
1115.desc: Proceed to scrap 3x large guns, 3x secondary guns, 3x recon seaplanes and have 2x 46cm triple gun mounts, 4x underway replenishment and 2700 ammo (All resources and Materials will be consumed upon completion)

1116.name: New equipment development plan III
1116.desc_jp:
「水上偵察機」「水上爆撃機/多用途水上機」「機銃」各x3を廃棄、「九八式水上偵察機(夜偵)」x2、
高速建造材x10、鋼材2,800を準備せよ！(任務達成後、準備した資源・夜偵・資材は消費します)
1116.desc: Scrap 3x Seaplane recon, 3x Seaplane bomber, 3x AA machine gun and have 2x Type 98 Reconnaissance Seaplane (Night Recon), 10x Flamethrower, 2800 steel (All resources and Materials will be consumed upon completion)

1117.name_jp: 【工廠任務】新夜偵の実戦配備
1117.name: Deployment of a new night recon
1117.desc_jp:
旗艦「川内改二」または「由良改二」の第一装備スロに改修最大「九八式水上偵察機(夜偵)」を配備。
改修最大「零式水上偵察機11型乙」x1、改修資材及び開発資材x各13、熟練搭乗員x3を用意せよ！
1117.desc: Have your secretary flagship Sendai Kai Ni or Yura Kai Ni equip a maximum improved type 98 Reconnaissance Seaplane (Night Recon) in the first slot and have a maximum improved Type 0 Recon Model 11B, 13x Improvement Material, 13x Development Material and 3x Skilled Crew Member (All resources and Materials will be consumed upon completion)

1118.name: [Arsenal Quest] Deployment of Hedgehog
1118.desc_jp:
旗艦「Samuel B.Roberts Mk.II」の第一スロに「5inch単装砲 Mk.30」(※改修してなくとも可)を装備。
開発資材x15、新型兵装資材x2、新型噴進装備開発資材x2、弾薬960を準備せよ！
1118.desc: Have your secretary flagship Samuel B.Roberts Mk.II equip 5inch Single Gun Mount Mk.30 without any improvment in the first slot and have 15x Development Material, 2x Armament Material, 2x Rocket Material, 960 ammo (All resources and Materials will be consumed upon completion)

1120.name_jp: 【機種整理統合】新型戦闘機の量産計画
1120.name: [Model Consolidation] Mass Production Plan For New Fighter
1120.desc_jp:
「艦上戦闘機」「艦上爆撃機」「艦上攻撃機」各x4を廃棄、「零式艦戦21型」x3、「零式艦戦52型」x3
ボーキサイト1,800を準備せよ！(任務達成後、準備した装備・ボーキサイトは消費します)
1120.desc: Have 3x Zero Fighter Model 21, 3x Zero Fighter Model 52 and 1800 bauxite. Proceed to scrap 4 carrier-based fighters, 4 dive bombers and 4 torpedo bombers (All resources and Materials will be consumed upon completion)

1123.name_jp: 改良三座水上偵察機の増備
1123.name: Improved 3-seat Reconnaissance Seaplane
1123.desc_jp:
旗艦「利根改二」または「由良改二」第一スロに最大改修「零式水上偵察機」。「九七式艦攻(九三一空)」
x2廃棄、ボーキ950、新型航空兵装資材x2、開発資材x35、熟練搭乗員x2を準備！
1123.desc: Have your secretary flagship Yura Kai Ni or Tone Kai Ni equip a max Type 0 Reconnaissance Seaplane in the first slot and then proceed to scrap 2x Type 97 Torpedo Bomber (931 Air Group) and have 950 bauxite, 2x New Model Aviation Material, 35x Development Material and 2x Skilled Crew Member (All resources and Materials will be consumed upon completion)

1127.name_jp: 艦載用「煙幕発生装置」の改良
1127.name: Improving Shipborne "Smoke Screen Generator"
1127.desc_jp:
【煙幕改良任務】旗艦「深雪改二」の第一装備スロに「発煙装置(煙幕)」を装備。開発資材x12、
新型兵装資材x2、さらに「発煙装置(煙幕)」x2、燃料x480、ボーキサイトx350を準備せよ！
1127.desc: Have your secretary flagship Miyuki Kai Ni equip a Smoke Generator (Smoke Screen) in the first slot and have 2 Smoke Generator (Smoke Screen), 12 Development Materials, 1 New Model Armament Material, 480 fuel, and 350 bauxite (All resources and Materials will be consumed upon completion)

1128.name_jp: 水上打撃戦用改良35.6cm砲の開発
1128.name: Development of Improved 35.6cm Gun Mount for Surface Combat
1128.desc_jp:
旗艦「榛名改二乙/丙」の第一装備スロに「35.6cm連装砲改三(ダズル迷彩仕様)」 (★+3以上)。
開発資材x48、新型砲熕兵装資材x2、「35.6cm連装砲」x5、弾薬960、ボーキサイト800を準備！
1128.desc: Have your secretary flagship Haruna Kai Ni B/C equip a 35.6cm Twin Gun Mount Kai 3 (Dazzle Camouflage) ★+3 (or higher) in the first slot and have 48x Development Material, 2x New Model Artillery Material, 5x 35.6cm Twin Gun Mount, 960 ammo and 800 bauxite (All resources and Materials will be consumed upon completion)

1129.name_jp: 潜水艦魚雷攻撃の精度向上
1129.name: Accuracy Improvement of Submarine Torpedo Attacks
1129.desc_jp:
旗艦に配備した潜水艦の第一装備スロに「後期型艦首魚雷(6門)」(★max) 。開発資材x36、
新型兵装資材x2、「61cm三連装(酸素)魚雷」x4、「熟練見張員」x3、弾薬800を準備せよ！
1129.desc: Have a submarine as secretary flagship with a Late Model Bow Torpedo Mount (6 Tubes) (★max) in the first slot and have 36x Development Material, 2x New Model Armament Material, 4x 61cm Triple (Oxygen) Torpedo Mount, 3x Skilled Lookouts, 800 ammo (All resources and Materials will be consumed upon completion)

1130.name_jp: 大規模改装の工廠準備
1130.name: Arsenal Preparation For Large-Scale Remodel
1130.desc_jp:
工廠事前準備任務：「機銃」「機関部強化」「バルジ」系各装備x3を廃棄。ドラム缶(輸送用)x3、
ボーキサイト2,700及び鋼材5,500を準備せよ！(任務達成後、準備した資源等は消費します)
1130.desc: Proceed to scrap 3x AA gun,  3x Engine/Boiler, 3x Armor bulge and have 3x Drum Canister, 2700 bauxite, 5500 steel (All resources and Materials will be consumed upon completion)

1131.name: Artillery Armament Maintenance
1131.desc_jp:
「小口径主砲」x18、「中口径主砲」x12、「爆雷」系装備x6を廃棄。「応急修理要員」x1を用意。
さらに弾薬2,500及び鋼材3,000を準備せよ！ (任務達成後、準備した資源等は消費します)
1131.desc: Have 1x emergency repair personnel, 2500 ammo and 3000 steel and then proceed to scrap 18x small caliber main guns, 12x medium caliber main guns and 6x depth charges (All resources and Materials will be consumed upon completion)

1132.name: Deployment of the improved Model D Gun!
1132.desc_jp:
旗艦「清霜改二/丁」の第一装備スロットに、「12.7cm連装砲D型改二」 (★+8以上)を装備。
開発資材x22、新型砲熕兵装資材x1、「12.7cm連装砲」x10、弾薬350、改修資材x8を準備！
1132.desc: Have your secretary flagship Kiyoshimo Kai Ni (D) equip 12.7cm Twin Gun Mount Model D Kai Ni which is at least ★+8 and have 22x DevMat, 1x New Model Gun Materials, 10x 12.7cm Twin Gun, 350 ammo and 8x Screws. (All resources and Materials will be consumed upon completion)

1133.name_jp: 逆探及び改良水上電探の実戦配備
1133.name: Definitive release of an improved combat RADAR!
1133.desc_jp:
旗艦「清霜改二/丁」または「朝霜改二」第一装備スロに「22号対水上電探改四(後期調整型)」
を装備。 開発資材x40、「13号対空電探改(後期型)」(★+4以上)x1、改修資材x6を準備！
1133.desc: Have your secretary flagship Kiyoshimo Kai Ni (D) or Asashimo Kai Ni equip a Type 22 Surface Radar Kai Yon (Calibrated Late Model) in the first slot and have 40x DevMat, Type 13 Air Radar Kai (Late Model) which is at least ★+4, 6x Screws (All resources and Materials will be consumed upon completion)

1134.name: Improvement of the Type 22 Surface Radar!
1134.desc_jp:
旗艦「時雨改二/改三」または「満潮改二」第一装備スロに「22号対水上電探改四(★max)」を
装備。開発資材x22、新型兵装資材x2、「22号対水上電探」x4、改修資材x6を準備せよ！
1134.desc: Have your secretary flagship Michishio Kai Ni or Shigure Kai Ni or Kai San equip a Type 22 Surface Radar Kai 4 ★max in the first slot and have 22x DevMat, 2x New Model Armament Materials, 4x Type 22 Surface Radar, 6x Screw (All resources and Materials will be consumed upon completion)

1137.name_jp: 鵜来型海防艦兵装の開発
1137.name: Development Of Armament For The Ukuru-class Kaiboukan
1137.desc_jp:
鵜来型海防艦を旗艦、同第一装備スロットに「三式爆雷投射機」を装備。さらに同装備x1及び
開発資材x32を準備、「九三式水中聴音機」「九四式爆雷投射機」「九五式爆雷」各x4を廃棄せよ！
1137.desc: Have an Ukuru-class as secretary flagship equipped with a Type 3 Depth Charge Projector in the first slot and then proceed to scrap 4x Type 93 Passive Sonar, 4x Type 94 Depth Charge Projector, 4x Type 95 Depth Charge and have 1x Type 3 Depth Charge Projector and 32 Development Materials (All resources and Materials will be consumed upon completion)

1138.name_jp: 【高射装置量産】94式高射装置の追加配備
1138.name: [Mass production of anti-aircraft equipment] Additional deployment of Type 94 AAFD
1138.desc_jp:
旗艦に秋月型駆逐艦を配備し、「91式高射装置」x4を廃棄。ボーキサイト1,300、鋼材480、
高速建造材x4、開発資材x16を準備せよ！(任務達成後、準備した資源・資材は消費します)
1138.desc: Have an Akizuki-class as secretary flagship then proceed to scrap 4x Type 91 AAFD and have 1300 bauxite, 480 steel, 4 flamethrowers and 16 devmats (All resources and Materials will be consumed upon completion)

1139.name_jp: 【艦隊通信能力の強化】通信要員の育成
1139.name: [Strengthening Fleet Communications Capabilities] Communications personnel training
1139.desc_jp:
旗艦「大淀」の第一スロに「13号対空電探」を装備。開発資材x20準備。「21号対空電探」x2、
「13号対空電探」x2、「戦闘糧食」x3を廃棄せよ！(任務達成後、開発資材は消費します)
1139.desc: Have your secretary flagship Ooyodo equip a Type 13 Air RADAR in the first slot and then proceed to scrap 2x Type 21 Air RADAR, 2x Type 13 Air RADAR and 3x Combat Ration and have 20x Development Materials (All resources and Materials will be consumed upon completion)

1140.name_jp: 【新鋭海外艦装備】新型四連装主砲の開発
1140.name: [New Foreign Ship Equipment] Development Of The New Quadruple Main Gun
1140.desc_jp:
旗艦「Richelieu Deux」第一及び第二スロに「38cm四連装砲改」を装備。開発資材x20及び
海外艦最新技術x1を準備。「41cm連装砲」x4を廃棄せよ！(任務達成後資材・装備は消費)
1140.desc: Have your secretary flagship Richelieu Deux equip two 38cm Quadruple Gun Kai in the first and second slot and then proceed to scrap 4x 41cm Twin Gun and have 1x Latest Overseas Warship Technology and 20x Development Materials (All resources and Materials will be consumed upon completion)

1141.name_jp: 最新改修型三座水上偵察機の開発
1141.name: Development Of The Latest Modified Three-seater Reconnaissance Seaplane
1141.desc_jp:
旗艦「大和改二/重」または「由良改二」「矢矧改二/乙」第一スロに最大改修「零式水上偵察機11型
乙」。「零式水上偵察機」x15廃棄、新型航空兵装資材x2、開発資材x60、夜間熟練搭乗員x1準備！
1141.desc: Have your secretary flagship Yamato Kai Ni (Kai Ni Juu) or Yura Kai Ni or Yahagi Kai Ni equip a ★max Type 0 Recon Seaplane Model 11B in the first slot and then proceed to scrap 15x Type 0 Recon Seaplane and have 2x New Model Aerial Armament Materials, 60x Development Material and 1x Night Skilled Crew Member (All resources and Materials will be consumed upon completion)

1142.name_jp: 最精鋭「天山」装備艦攻隊の配備
1142.name: Deploying The Elite "Tenzan" Equipped Attacker Squadron
1142.desc_jp:
旗艦「翔鶴改二/甲」第一スロに「天山一二型(村田隊)」配備。「天山」x4を廃棄。「天山一二型甲改
(空六号電探改装備機)」x1、新型航空兵装資材x2、開発資材x48、夜間熟練搭乗員x1準備！
1142.desc: Have your secretary flagship Shoukaku Kai Ni/A equip a Tenzan Model 12 (Murata Squadron) in the first slot and then proceed to scrap 4x Tenzan and have 1x Tenzan Model 12A Kai (w/ Type 6 Airborne Radar Kai), 2x New Model Aerial Armament Material, 1x Night Skilled Crew Member and 48x Development Materials (All resources and Materials will be consumed upon completion)

1143.name: "Kirishima Kai Ni C" Arsenal Remodel Quest
1143.desc_jp:
旗艦「霧島改二丙」第一スロに「35.6cm連装砲改二」(★+8以上)装備。「35.6cm連装砲」x8を
廃棄。「35.6cm連装砲改」x1、新型砲熕兵装資材x2、鋼材7,800、新型兵装資材x2準備！
1143.desc: Have your secretary flagship Kirishima Kai Ni C equip a ★+8 35.6cm Twin Gun Mount Kai Ni in the first slot and then proceed to scrap 8x 35.6cm Twin Gun and have 1x 35.6cm Twin Gun Mount Kai, 2x New Model Gun Mount Improvement Material, 2x New Model Armament Material and 7800x steel (All resources and Materials will be consumed upon completion)

1145.name_jp: 【工廠任務】伊号潜水艦装備の拡充
1145.name: [Factory Quest] I-go Submarine Equipment Expansion
1145.desc_jp:
旗艦潜水艦第1スロに「零式水上偵察機」(★+4以上)。「零式水上偵察機」x8廃棄。魚雷装備x15
を廃棄。「九三式水中聴音機」x4、新型航空兵装資材x1、開発資材x60、新型兵装資材x1を準備せよ！
1145.desc: Have a SSV as secretary flagship equip a ★+4 Type 0 Recon Seaplane in the first slot and then proceed to scrap 8x Type 0 Recon Seaplane and 15x Torpedoes and have 4x Type 93 Passive SONAR, 2x New Model Aerial Armament Materials, 1x New Model Armament Material and 60x Development Materials (All resources and Materials will be consumed upon completion)

1148.name_jp: 【対空兵装の拡充】94式高射装置の増加配備
1148.name: [Improvement of AA Armaments] Increased Production of Type 94 AAFD
1148.desc_jp:
旗艦「白雪改二」または「吹雪改二」第一及び第二装備スロットに「91式高射装置」を装備。
開発資材x16及び改修資材x4を準備。「91式高射装置」x3、「13号対空電探」x3を廃棄せよ！
1148.desc: Have your secretary flagship Fubuki Kai Ni or Shirayuki Kai Ni equip a Type 91 AAFD in the first and second slot and then proceed to scrap 3x Type 91 AAFD, 3x Type 13 Air RADAR and have 16x Development Materials and 4x Screws (All resources and Materials will be consumed upon completion)
